questions.question: What the customer benefits from the agile methodology?
answers: Customers can make changes without paying exorbitant costs
Customers do not have to be involved throughout the process

questions.question: What is the average duration of Agile scrum sprint?
answers: It doesn't matter, need to finish every task and then to deliver
Two weeks - Three weeks is the average duration
The duration is usually 12 weeks (3 months)

questions.question: What are the 3 scrum roles?
answers: Product owner, scrum master, development team
Scrum master, QA tester, product owner
Product owner, development team, Team Manager
Development team, Team Manager, QA tester
